presentation.description: Hello, my name is Oscar Espa침a 游녦. I'm a front-end developer with experience in design and development of web and mobile applications. I love to learn new technologies, use design trends and I focus on delivering a quality product according to the user's needs.

myServices.web: Web applications development, web sites, E - commerce
myServices.mobile: Cross-platform mobile application development (Android and iOS)
myServices.design: UI design of web and mobile applications

aboutMe.description1: My name is Oscar Espa침a, I am an engineer in Electronics and Information Networks graduated from the National Polytechnic School in Quito - Ecuador, I consider myself passionate about web and mobile development, and I am constantly learning new technologies.
aboutMe.description2: My interest in web development started at the beginning of 2019 and since then I have never stopped learning, I have done projects for small, medium and large companies.
aboutMe.description3: Throughout my professional career I have participated in projects for both Back-end and Front-end, however my specialty is Front-end development, with which I feel more comfortable. In addition, I have knowledge about interface design for both web and mobile applications using FIGMA in order to deliver a product that meets customer expectations.
aboutMe.description4: I like working in a team, since I can share my knowledge with other people and I can also learn from them, allowing me to grow as a person and professional.

oscarEspana.title: Portfolio -
oscarEspana.description: A personal website where you will find key information about me, including work experience, notable projects, and contact details. It showcases an attractive, captivating, and minimalist design.
oscarEspana.technologies: React, Next JS, Tailwind CSS, GSAP, Scrolltrigger

grupoTransoceanica.title: Group
grupoTransoceanica.description: A web application designed to automate key processes related to flight scheduling for airline operators, enhancing efficiency and organization in the aviation industry.
grupoTransoceanica.technologies: React, Next JS, MUI, Typescript, GraphQL, Redux Toolkit

bella.description: A minimalist and elegant landing page that captivates with its sophisticated design and a wide variety of animations that seamlessly unfold while scrolling.
bella.technologies: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JS, GSAP, Scrolltrigger

formikMui.title: Forms with MUI
formikMui.description: A collection of examples demonstrating the power of Formik in handling forms of various categories. This project includes multiple reusable components, facilitating development in future projects.
formikMui.technologies: React, Next JS, MUI (Material UI), Formik, Typescript

fitbaFood.title: Fitba
fitbaFood.description: A landing page that highlights the delicious menu of healthy food and exclusive additional services offered. Discover a unique and complete gastronomic experience with Fitba Food.
fitbaFood.technologies: React, Next JS, MUI (Material UI), Framer Motion, Typescript

delivery.description: A clone of a popular food delivery application, where you will discover a wide selection of high-quality restaurants and products to satisfy all your culinary cravings.
delivery.technologies: React Native, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, Sanity.io

metadata.title: Oscar Espa침a - Portfolio
metadata.description: I'm Oscar Spain, passionate about front-end developer with experience in web and mobile application design and development. Contact me
